title: MCP Servers Catalog
description: Comprehensive catalog of MCP servers for Cursor agent system integration

core.name: Essential/Core Tools
core.description: Foundational tools recommended for all projects

filesystem.name: Filesystem
filesystem.description: Secure file read/write/search with configurable access controls

git.name: Git
git.description: Git repository operations - commits, branches, diff, log

memory.name: Memory
memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph memory for maintaining context across sessions

fetch.name: Fetch
fetch.description: Fetch and parse web content for LLM consumption
setupSteps: Built-in to Cursor - no setup required

tools.name: fetch
tools.description: Fetch URL and convert to markdown

brave-search.name: Brave Search
brave-search.description: Web and local search via Brave Search API (2000 free queries/month)
brave-search.authenticationNote: Get free API key at https://brave.com/search/api/

exa.name: Exa
exa.description: AI-optimized web and code search engine

sequentialthinking.name: Sequential Thinking
sequentialthinking.description: Structured problem-solving through dynamic reasoning sequences

tools.name: sequentialthinking
tools.description: Dynamic reflective problem-solving with revision support

github.name: GitHub
github.description: Full GitHub integration - repos, PRs, issues, Actions, code search
github.authenticationNote: Create Personal Access Token at https://github.com/settings/tokens

gitlab.name: GitLab
gitlab.description: GitLab integration - projects, MRs, pipelines, issues
gitlab.authenticationNote: Create Personal Access Token in GitLab Settings > Access Tokens
setupSteps: Create PAT in GitLab Settings > Access Tokens
Set GITLAB_TOKEN and GITLAB_URL environment variables

playwright.name: Playwright
playwright.description: Browser automation for testing, scraping, and web interaction

openapi.name: OpenAPI
openapi.description: Generate MCP tools from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications
openapi.authenticationNote: Depends on the API being accessed

context7.name: Context7
context7.description: Library documentation for 4000+ libraries with up-to-date info

mongodb.description: MongoDB document database and Atlas management

prisma.name: Prisma
prisma.description: Prisma ORM with migrations and schema introspection

supabase.name: Supabase
supabase.description: Supabase BaaS with Postgres, auth, and storage
supabase.authenticationNote: Get API keys from Supabase project settings
setupSteps: Get Supabase URL and API key from project settings
Set SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_KEY environment variables

firebase.authenticationNote: Use Firebase service account or OAuth
